trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around November 30th 1969
Summary: 30' gray metalic circular object with blue,red,green,yellow round lights on its bottom
divs: Sighting Details This written report was submitted to RUFOS (Roundtown UFO Society)Circleville,OH by the witness. I am their F.I. also.This event happened in the fall of 1970.I will write the personal account exactly as submitted by the witness: Football season 1970-going to Lancaster,Ohio-just turned off 159 to 22 to Lancaster-In fork of hills on right-saw headlights (bright)coming toward St.Rt.22 Did not seem like it came at a high rate of speed.Got closer finally was over our car.Just seemed to stay over our car.No noise quite large.We traveled approx 2 miles and it just went back over hillside on left of 22. When we got inside Lancaster.pulled up beside police cruiser and told them what we saw. They acted like they did not believe us.
